DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify biomarkers utilized diagnosis chronic pelvic pain syndrome men .
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic pelvic pain hallmark patient chronic pelvic pain syndrome ( CPPS ) , non-bacterial category prostatitis significant source morbidity American men . The cause CPPS unknown lack convenient biomarkers diagnosis syndrome . This project examine expression biomarkers express prostatic fluid adult men without diagnosis CPPS . Thus specific aim validate use chemokines MCP-1 MIP-1alpha mast cell tryptase biomarkers CPPS human correlate level CPPS symptom .
DOC.criteria: CP/CPPS group inclusion criterion Patients eligible study meet follow criterion : Participant sign dated appropriate Informed Consent document . Agreed participate Study procedure . Participant least 18 year age . Participant report response least 1 pain , pressure discomfort scale ( SYMQ , Question # 1 ) . Participant report pain discomfort 8 domain Male Genitourinary Pain Index ( MGUPI ) ( item 1a , 1b , 1c , 1d , 2a , 2b , 2c , 2d ) . These CP/CPPS symptom present majority time 3 month previous 6 month . Participant ongoing symptomatic urethral stricture . Participant ongoing neurological disease disorder affect bladder bowel fistula . Participant history cystitis cause tuberculosis , radiation therapy Cytoxan/cyclophosphamide therapy . Participant augmentation cystoplasty cystectomy . Participant history cancer ( exception skin cancer ) . Participant current major psychiatric disorder psychiatric medical issue would interfere study participation ( e.g . dementia , psychosis , upcoming major surgery , etc ) . Participant diagnose unilateral orchialgia , without pelvic symptom . Participant history transurethral microwave thermotherapy ( TUMT ) , transurethral needle ablation ( TUNA ) , balloon dilation , prostate cryosurgery , laser procedure . Control group exclusion criterion In addition exclusion criterion list additional criterion control subject follow . 1 . In past year , symptom discomfort pain pelvic region extend period time . 2 . Volunteers urinary tract infection urine culture value > 100,000 CFU/ml within past three month . 3 . Volunteers treat intravesical chemotherapy BCG . 4 . Volunteers follow sexually transmit disease ( STDs ) gonorrhea , chlamydia , mycoplasma trichomonas . 5 . Volunteers inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's disease ulcerative colitis , irritable bowel syndrome )
